html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-01852023-03-09LAB
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS (EMPLOYEES UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE) in order to (1) raise the referenced minimum age of employment from 17 years to 18 years of age with respect to certain types of work; (2) establish that a person under 18 years of age may not work between 11:00 p.m. and 6:00 a.m. on the following day; and (3) require employers to keep records of the age of employees under 18 years of age.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0040 Publication Date: 2023-03-29
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Labour Standards Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS (EMPLOYEES UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE) in order to (1) raise the referenced minimum age of employment from 17 years to 18 years of age with respect to certain types of work; (2) establish that a person under 18 years of age may not work between 11:00 p.m. and 6:00 a.m. on the following day; and (3) require employers to keep records of the age of employees under 18 years of age.
